title: Your account has been transferred to a different region???

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

My friend has a problem with his account. 
Last time he played was yesterday (15-09-2017), he wants to login today (16-09-2017) but it says that his region has been changed.
He tried every region with the same login details but no region worked. 
He also can't login into this site so im writing this for him.  

His ingame name is| wesselskillzNL 
The region is| EU WEST

Could someone help him with this problem?
We hope to hear from someone soon!

Your sincerely,

Rick.

replies.body:
Got the same problem mate, still no answer or solution.
Mine is getting weirder, because ive got a russian mail from riot saying I used illegal software (which I never used).

Our account team can help directly with this and recover the account.  Have your friend reach out to them by filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll reply back to him as soon as we can!
